alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Jefferson; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 11:31AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Fond du Lac, northwestern Washington, northwestern Jefferson and southern Dodge Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Juneau to Waterloo. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and up to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Hartford, Mayville, Horicon, Waterloo, Juneau, Theresa, Hustisford, Iron Ridge, Addison, Ashippun, Rubicon, Lebanon, Woodland, Reeseville, Neosho, Richwood, Wayne, Clyman, and Lowell. This includes the following highways... Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 42 and 53. Interstate 41 between mile markers 72 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Jefferson; Washington
